existing_features.title: Add a simple, safe Google AdSense integration using the existing ad system by wiring `frontend/src/config/ads.ts` with real AdSense snippets (provider head script + at least one ad slot), so ads can be displayed on the customer-facing landing page and the site can be monetized.

Add a small in-app configuration UI (English text) to let the site owner paste their Google AdSense `ca-pub-...` client ID and ad slot IDs, and persist these settings in the browser (e.g., localStorage) without requiring backend changes; when configured, the UI should populate `providerHeadSnippet` and the configured `adsConfig.slots` at runtime.

Ensure AdSense is not mounted in admin experiences and is disabled by default when running inside the Capacitor mobile wrapper (to avoid policy/UX issues), while remaining enabled on the standard web deployment when configured.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate Google AdSense ads so the user can monetize/earn money from the site/app

projectName: Integrate Google AdSense monetization on customer-facing pages
